promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic crocodile water-type pokemon with dark scales. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or crocodile. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Riviguard, a a young basic crocodile water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Ice Ball, Aqua Liner. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "crocodile", "water" or "Riviguard". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, crocodile-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: "Dwelling in vibrant currents, Riviguard harnesses the chilling power of frost and liquefied torrents, spinning icy orbs for defense."
